content: {"name": "Old Bergen Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Some of the referral agencies in Jersey City include: Let's Celebrate, Horizon Health Center , Health and Human Services, Jersey City Episcopal Community Development, C-Line Community Outreach Center (Community Builders) , and Urban League.\n\nNovember and December, when distribution is one week before Thanksgiving or Christmas.", "email": "", "url": "http://www.oldbergenchurch.com/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1 Highland Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "McGinley Square", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07306", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.72705699999999, "longitude": -74.06770039999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(210) 433-1815", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Number of household members"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Referral required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social Security Card Required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
